kubejs.ponder.arboreal_extractor.text_1: The Arboreal Extractor can be used to extract fluids from trees.
kubejs.ponder.arboreal_extractor.text_2: You can use pipes to extract the fluid from the Arboreal Extractor
kubejs.ponder.device_rock_gen.text_1: The Igneous Extruder is used to generate rocks from two input blocks placed on either side.
kubejs.ponder.device_rock_gen.text_2: You can extract it's outputs with a chute beneath it.
kubejs.ponder.device_rock_gen.text_3: The main input for the Igneous Extruder will always be Lava
kubejs.ponder.device_rock_gen.text_4: Water and Lava will generate cobblestone.
kubejs.ponder.device_rock_gen.text_5: You can also combine Lava and Congealed Blood to generate Netherrack.
kubejs.ponder.device_rock_gen.text_6: More recipes can be viewed using JEI.
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus_forge_construct: Place Chiseled Arcane Polished Darkstone Here
Next, Place A Smithing Table In The Center
kubejs.ponder.machine_refinery.text_1: The Refinery is a useful machine capable of separating a liquid into two liquids and an item!
kubejs.ponder.machine_refinery.text_2: You can input a fluid with a pump.
kubejs.ponder.machine_refinery.text_3: Fluids can be extracted with filtered pipes.
kubejs.ponder.machine_refinery.text_4: You can extract the item output with a funnel.
kubejs.ponder.radiant_quartz_infusion.te: Radiant Quartz can be created through a process called 'Soaking'
Drop a piece of Nether Quartz into a pool of Molten Lumium
The Nether Quartz will absorb the Molten Lumium resulting in the creation of Radiant Quartz
kubejs.ponder.stirling_dynamo.text_1: The Stirling Dynamo is a useful tool, having the ability to generate FE from flammable materials.
kubejs.ponder.stirling_dynamo.text_2: The Stirling Dynamo will always output energy to an energy container that connects to it's energy output
